Key Match Events: The match ended in a goalless draw
Several substitutions were made by both teams during the game
Pre-Game Insights: The match was the first competitive outing for India under Manolo Marquez as head coach
The article previewed the expectations from Manolo Marquez's style of play
The match was seen as a new era for Indian football
Post-Match Reflections: Manolo Marquez described the match as a 'boring game' but praised the players' effort
The draw was seen as a positive start for the team under the new coach
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at the GMC Balayogi Stadium in Hyderabad
The match marked Manolo Marquez's homecoming as a coach
There were some discussions about the attendance and marketing issues related to the match
